pages.title: Woodland Staff
pages.text: The woodland staff is a creative tool that allows you to copy and paste tree states.$(br2)It can be obtained by using the /dt createstaff command, or by getting it from the creative menu.

You can then set/reset the target species by right clicking a tree, or set/reset the tree and JoCode by shift right clicking a tree.$(br2)JoCodes are the compressed description of a tree's shape and do not depend on species. Using the Woodland Staff will also copy this code to your clipboard.$(br2)Although this is a creative tool, it has an axe harvest level of 3, making it a fast tool for cutting down trees.
